l1_part2_questions.question:
Describe a piece of technology you want to buy. You should say:
What it is
How much it costs
What it does
And explain why you want it.
l1_part2_questions.model_answer:
I'd like to talk about a new laptop that is absolutely State-of-the-art [最先进的]. It is a Must-have [必备品] for my professional graphic design work. Since it is Cutting-edge [尖端的] technology, it unfortunately Costs an arm and a leg [极其昂贵] right now. It is incredibly Compact [紧凑的] and light, making it very easy to carry around the city. I want it because it is Versatile [多功能的] enough for both gaming and video editing tasks. My current laptop is Obsolete [过时的] and frustrates me daily. This new one would be Magnificent [宏伟的] to own and use every single day.

Brainstorming Ideas:
- Tech: Laptop / Phone
- Cost: Expensive / High
- Do: Work / Play
- Why: Fast / New

l1_part2_questions.question:
Describe something you bought that was expensive. You should say:
What you bought
When you bought it
Where you bought it
And explain if it was worth the money.
l1_part2_questions.model_answer:
I'm going to describe a Pricey [昂贵的] professional camera I bought last year. I bought it at a big electronics store in the shopping mall. It is a Compact [小巧的] model but takes amazing, high-quality photos effortlessly. Although it Cost an arm and a leg [极其昂贵], I think it is a State-of-the-art [最先进的] device worth the price. It is Versatile [多功能的] with many different lenses for portraits and landscapes. I felt it was worth it because my old camera was Obsolete [过时的]. The picture quality is simply Magnificent [宏伟的] and clear. It captures every detail perfectly.

Brainstorming Ideas:
- Item: Camera / Watch
- When: Last month / Year
- Where: Mall / Online
- Worth: Yes / Quality

l1_part2_questions.question:
Describe a useful object you own. You should say:
What it is
How long you have had it
How you use it
And explain why it is useful.
l1_part2_questions.model_answer:
I wish to talk about my smartphone, which is a Must-have [必备品] for modern life today. I have had it for two years now and use it constantly. It is a Cutting-edge [尖端的] model that is still very fast and reliable. Because it has Spacious [宽敞的] storage, I can keep all my photos and work files on it safely. It is useful because it is so Versatile [多功能的] for communication, work, and entertainment. It was Pricey [昂贵的], but I use it daily. I would be completely lost without this Compact [小巧的] tool in my pocket.

Brainstorming Ideas:
- Object: Phone / Car
- Time: 2 years / Long
- Use: Call / Drive
- Useful: Easy / Fast

l2_part3_questions.question: How will artificial intelligence change our lives?
l2_part3_questions.model_answer: [Opinion] From my perspective [观点/视角], it will totally Revolutionize [彻底变革] society and work. [Reason] Artificial Intelligence [人工智能] can process data much faster and more accurately than humans. [Example] Unless we control it carefully, it might cause increased Isolation [孤立] as people interact more with machines than people. However, the Silver lining [一线希望] is better healthcare and efficiency. We must adapt quickly to these changes to survive and thrive.

l2_part3_questions.question: Is technology making us more isolated?
l2_part3_questions.model_answer: [Opinion] Unfortunately, I think it is. Social Isolation [孤立] is increasing rapidly. [Reason] People spend more time in a Virtual [虚拟的] world than the real one, ignoring those nearby. [Example] While we can connect with anyone At the click of a button [极其便捷], we often lack real, deep human contact. It is a sad side effect of progress. We need to find a better balance in our daily lives.
idea_suggestions: Opinion: Social media. Reason: Fake lives. Example: Texting instead of talking.

l2_part3_questions.question: What are the benefits of online shopping?
l2_part3_questions.model_answer: [Opinion] I believe the main benefit is unmatched convenience and speed. [Reason] You can buy anything you need At the click of a button [极其便捷] from home. [Example] Since it saves time and fuel, it helps us Keep up with the times [与时俱进] in a busy world. However, it can be a Distraction [干扰] from saving money responsibly. It is very easy to overspend without realizing it.
idea_suggestions: Opinion: Variety. Reason: Global. Example: Buying from other countries.

l2_part3_questions.question: How does technology affect work?
l2_part3_questions.model_answer: [Opinion] It seems to me that it makes work faster but significantly more stressful. [Reason] Artificial Intelligence [人工智能] tools help, but they also create constant Distraction [干扰] and pressure. [Example] Provided that the internet Infrastructure [基础设施] is good, remote work is possible and efficient for many people. We can work from anywhere now. It fundamentally changes office life and expectations for employees.

l2_part3_questions.question: Should we preserve old technology?
l2_part3_questions.model_answer: [Opinion] Unquestionably, yes. It is an important part of our technical Heritage [遗产]. [Reason] Understanding how we got here helps us innovate effectively for the future. [Example] Even though old machines are obsolete, they can Revolutionize [彻底变革] our understanding of history and progress. Museums should keep them safe for education. They are valuable learning tools for the next generation.

l2_part3_questions.question: Is virtual reality useful for education?
l2_part3_questions.model_answer: [Opinion] I think it is incredibly useful and engaging for students. [Reason] Virtual [虚拟的] classrooms allow students to experience history or science directly and safely. [Example] Whereas books are flat, VR lets you see the Silver lining [一线希望] of complex topics clearly and interactively. It makes learning fun and memorable. Schools should use it more to inspire young minds.
